name: Mastering Backend Development with AWS Amplify
topics: Introduction to AWS Amplify and its ecosystem
Setting up a serverless backend with Amplify
Building and managing APIs with AWS Amplify
Data storage solutions using Amplify DataStore

beginner.hint: AWS Amplify is focused on handling server-side operations.

beginner.question: Which feature of AWS Amplify helps in building and managing APIs?
beginner.hint: This feature focuses on creating interfaces for applications to interact with.
